question: The Product Owner is most likely responsible for which of the following. Select all that apply.
options: Having a vision for the product
Updating DNS entries for critical HTTP services
Rejecting user stories based on their judgment and expertise
Prioritizing the backlog with input from developers and stakeholders
Deciding which developers work on which user stories
correct_answers: Having a vision for the product
Rejecting user stories based on their judgment and expertise
Prioritizing the backlog with input from developers and stakeholders

question: An agile/scrum advocate such is likely to say that one duty of the Product Owner is to decide what not to build.
Imagine you're talking to an experienced scrum advocate. They would likely say which of the following ideas are key elements of the agile methodology. Select all that apply.
options: Document as you go, and only as needed
Fully complete the product design before writing any code
correct_answers: Document as you go, and only as needed

question: Go is a language that is most often used on which side of a client-server architecture?
HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are most strongly associate with which of the following?
Which of the following most accurately describes a "web framework"?
options: Collections of functions, objects, rules and other code constructs designed to solve common problems
An application, like a web browser, that is used to send HTTP requests and interact with servers
A method, or philosophy, for constructing web sites using Agile values
correct_answers: Collections of functions, objects, rules and other code constructs designed to solve common problems

question: Which of the following would most typically speak to a database storing customer information?
The Go language is...
options: Dynamically typed---you don't have to say what kind of variables (int, string, etc) a function takes when you write the function
Statically typed---you must say what kind of variables (int, string, etc) a function takes when you write the function
correct_answers: Statically typed---you must say what kind of variables (int, string, etc) a function takes when you write the function

question: The Go language is known as which of the following, according to the article by Gosiar. Select all that apply.
options: Fast to compile (to turn source code into a runnable program)
Good for teams due to the clarity of its code structure
correct_answers: Fast to compile (to turn source code into a runnable program)
Good for teams due to the clarity of its code structure
